summary: This bill, the Caza Ranches LLC and Department of Homeland Security Land Exchange Act of 2025, authorizes an exchange of land in Artesia, New Mexico, between Caza Ranches LLC and the Department of Homeland Security. The exchange involves approximately 160 acres of Federal land for approximately 160 acres of non-Federal land owned by Caza Ranches LLC. The exchanged land will be used by the Federal Law Enforcement Training Centers (FLETC). The Secretary of Homeland Security is responsible for the exchange, including managing costs and establishing terms and conditions. The bill outlines definitions, exchange terms, appraisal processes, and land title requirements, including boundary adjustments and map details. Both parties agree on a written memorialized exchange agreement.
